results.title: Products & Solutions - NextEra Energy Services
results.content: NextEra Energy Services is a leading provider of electricity and natural gas solutions, catering to organizations that seek to revolutionize their energy strategies. ## Customized Energy Solutions for You. Our flexible, comprehensive offerings are designed to meet the unique needs of businesses across our service areas. NextEra Energy Services delivers commercial power supply options that reduce costs through flexible pricing models and strategic procurement guidance. ### Commercial Natural Gas. NextEra Energy Services provides commercial natural gas solutions that minimize costs through strategic procurement and flexible pricing models. NextEra Energy Services' engineering team implements data-driven strategies that optimize commercial energy usage and reduce operational costs. NextEra Energy Services delivers load management solutions that generate cost savings through strategic demand adjustments during off peak energy hours. ## Customized Energy Solutions for Your Area. To see where we serve commercial electricity, natural gas for business and other energy solutions, visit our service area map.

With NextEra Energy Services, you can find affordable and straight forward residential energy plans in your area. Gain industry intelligence and get the latest news on how NextEra Energy Services is supporting customers through energy supply. ## NextEra Energy Services. Leveraging the robust capabilities of the NextEra Energy family of companies, we offer tailored, cost-effective energy solutions that prioritize operational excellence and customer satisfaction. By integrating diverse forms of energy such as electricity, natural gas and other innovative technologies, NextEra Energy Services is committed to delivering dependable solutions that align with the evolving demands of America's energy landscape. We offer tailored, reliable and cost-effective energy solutions to meet your business needs. With NextEra Energy Services, you can find affordable, straightforward energy plans. Serving 16 U.S. markets with tailored energy solutions that meet the needs of commercial and residential customers.

results.title: NextEra Infrastructure Solutions | Home
results.content: ### Products & Solutions. Discover how our cutting-edge infrastructure solutions are transforming the way people live and do business. Our expertise lies in developing cost-effective energy infrastructure solutions for the future. # NEXTERA INFRASTRUCTURE SOLUTIONS. # NEXTERA INFRASTRUCTURE SOLUTIONS. # ABOUT NEXTERA INFRASTRUCTURE SOLUTIONS. NextEra Infrastructure Solutions offers a comprehensive range of infrastructure solutions that include fiber broadband, energy-efficient LED lighting, advanced metering and energy efficiency services. As members of the NextEra Energy family of companies, our expertise in utility infrastructure and energy generation makes us uniquely qualified to help our customers achieve their infrastructure goals efficiently and effectively. Our turnkey solutions are tailored to help reduce capital expenditures, increase operational reliability and flexibility, and support communities, businesses and government entities across the United States. # SOLUTIONS THAT DELIVER IMPACTFUL RESULTS. NextEra Infrastructure Solutions and our exclusive network of platform service providers offer intelligent products and services that help maximize efficiency and cost savings. Empower communication and drive progress with fiber infrastructure.
